details:
This document exists to answer questions about what PROS is and its general use. For more coding-specific help, visit Coding FAQ

This document is in progress, we will be adding content as we're asked pertinent questions.


# Does PROS have a graphics library for the Brain's Screen?

Yes, we have ported [LVGL](https://littlevgl.com/) for use with the V5 Brain. You can find documentation for it on the LVGL site.
name: md_docs_getting-started_faq
title: PROS FAQ
